---
title: "What to forecast"
editor: 
  markdown: 
    wrap: sentence
---

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

:::


## Targets files

### Terrestrial fluxes



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
url <- "https://sdsc.osn.xsede.org/bio230014-bucket01/challenges/targets/project_id=neon4cast/duration=P1D/terrestrial_daily-targets.csv.gz"
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
terrestrial_targets <- read_csv(url, show_col_types = FALSE)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(terrestrial_targets)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Rows: 111,244
Columns: 6
$ project_id  <chr> "neon4cast", "neon4cast", "neon4cast", "neon4cast", "neon4…
$ site_id     <chr> "BART", "BART", "BART", "BART", "BART", "BART", "BART", "B…
$ datetime    <dttm> 2017-02-02, 2017-02-02, 2017-02-03, 2017-02-03, 2017-02-0…
$ duration    <chr> "P1D", "P1D", "P1D", "P1D", "P1D", "P1D", "P1D", "P1D", "P…
$ variable    <chr> "le", "nee", "le", "nee", "le", "nee", "le", "nee", "le", …
$ observation <dbl> 2.7087720, 0.5801368, 8.4720864, 0.6873984, 6.6410325, 0.6…
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
|variable |duration |Description                                   |
|:--------|:--------|:---------------------------------------------|
|le       |P1D      |daily mean latent heat flux (W/m2)            |
|nee      |P1D      |daily mean Net ecosystem exchange (gC/m2/day) |
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
terrestrial_targets |> 
  filter(site_id %in% c("HARV", "OSBS")) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = datetime, y = observation)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_grid(variable~site_id, scales = "free_y") +
  theme_bw()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](targets_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### Aquatics


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
url <- "https://sdsc.osn.xsede.org/bio230014-bucket01/challenges/targets/project_id=neon4cast/duration=P1D/aquatics-targets.csv.gz"
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
aquatics_targets <- read_csv(url, show_col_types = FALSE)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(aquatics_targets)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Rows: 58,082
Columns: 6
$ project_id  <chr> "neon4cast", "neon4cast", "neon4cast", "neon4cast", "neon4…
$ site_id     <chr> "ARIK", "ARIK", "ARIK", "ARIK", "ARIK", "ARIK", "ARIK", "A…
$ datetime    <dttm> 2016-08-17, 2016-08-18, 2016-08-19, 2016-08-20, 2016-08-2…
$ duration    <chr> "P1D", "P1D", "P1D", "P1D", "P1D", "P1D", "P1D", "P1D", "P…
$ variable    <chr> "temperature", "temperature", "temperature", "temperature"…
$ observation <dbl> 24.55817, 20.60144, 20.14269, 17.72215, 17.73065, 19.86279…
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
|variable    |duration |Description                                             |
|:-----------|:--------|:-------------------------------------------------------|
|temperature |P1D      |Surface Mean Daily Water Temperature (Celsius)          |
|chla        |P1D      |daily mean Chlorophyll-a (ug/L)                         |
|oxygen      |P1D      |Surface Mean Daily Dissolved Oxygen Concentration (mgL) |
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
aquatics_targets |> 
  filter(site_id %in% c("BARC", "CRAM")) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = datetime, y = observation)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_grid(variable~site_id, scales = "free_y") +
  theme_bw()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Removed 219 rows containing missing values (`geom_point()`).
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](targets_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### Phenology

```{.r .cell-code}
phenology_targets <- read_csv(url, show_col_types = FALSE)
```

|variable |duration |Description |

|gcc_90   |P1D      |NA          |

```{.r .cell-code}
phenology_targets |> 
  filter(site_id %in% c("HARV", "OSBS")) |>

```

### Beetle communities


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
url <- "https://sdsc.osn.xsede.org/bio230014-bucket01/challenges/targets/project_id=neon4cast/duration=P1W/beetles-targets.csv.gz"
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
beetles_targets <- read_csv(url, show_col_types = FALSE)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(beetles_targets)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Rows: 5,280
Columns: 6
$ project_id  <chr> "neon4cast", "neon4cast", "neon4cast", "neon4cast", "neon4…
$ site_id     <chr> "ABBY", "ABBY", "ABBY", "ABBY", "ABBY", "ABBY", "ABBY", "A…
$ datetime    <dttm> 2016-09-12, 2016-09-12, 2016-09-26, 2016-09-26, 2017-05-0…
$ duration    <chr> "P1W", "P1W", "P1W", "P1W", "P1W", "P1W", "P1W", "P1W", "P…
$ variable    <chr> "abundance", "richness", "abundance", "richness", "abundan…
$ observation <dbl> 0.3599440, 14.0000000, 0.8171691, 13.0000000, 0.2012987, 1…
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
|variable  |duration |Description                                                                                           |
|:---------|:--------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|abundance |P1W      |Total number of carabid individuals per trap-night, estimated each week of the year at each NEON site |
|richness  |P1W      |Total number of unique ‘species’ in a sampling bout for each NEON site each week.                     |
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
beetles_targets |> 
  filter(site_id %in% c("HARV", "OSBS")) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = datetime, y = observation)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_grid(variable~site_id, scales = "free_y") +
  theme_bw()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](targets_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-23-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

## Sites


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
site_list <- read_csv("../neon4cast_field_site_metadata.csv", show_col_types = FALSE) |> 
  rename(site_id = field_site_id) |> 
  select(site_id, field_site_name, terrestrial, aquatics, phenology, ticks, beetles) 
```

## Additional variables

### Hourly water temperature

Daily time-step variables measured in the monitored stream (Tunnel Branch; site_id = tubr)


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
url <- "https://sdsc.osn.xsede.org/bio230014-bucket01/challenges/targets/project_id=neon4cast/duration=PT1H/aquatics-expanded-observations.csv.gz"

aquatics_expanded <- read_csv(url, show_col_types = FALSE)
glimpse(aquatics_expanded)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Rows: 1,412,364
Columns: 6
$ project_id  <chr> "neon4cast", "neon4cast", "neon4cast", "neon4cast", "neon4…

$ datetime    <dttm> 2017-08-19 00:00:00, 2017-08-19 00:00:00, 2017-08-19 00:0…
$ duration    <chr> "PT1H", "PT1H", "PT1H", "PT1H", "PT1H", "PT1H", "PT1H", "P…
$ variable    <chr> "temperature", "temperature", "temperature", "temperature"…
$ observation <dbl> 29.570, 29.600, 29.610, 29.610, 29.610, 29.658, 29.510, 29…
```
